name: Dont Miss Our Upcoming CODE Presents Webinar: Prompt Engineering on August 30, 2023 @ 1:00pm Eastern (UTC-4)
content:
CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click on
links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content
is safe.




CODE Presents Logo
[https://epsenterprise.blob.core.windows.net/permanent-files/FileAttachments/ad560040_a78e_4b75_a6db_c09b182973f4/CODE_Presents_white_small_transparent_border.png]


CODE PRESENTS: PROMPT ENGINEERING - HOW TO TALK TO AN AI

Dear Govindarajan,

If you've already registered for our CODE Presents: Prompt Engineering - How to
Talk to an AI webinar, thank you again. Please move on to your next email.

If not Join us Wednesday, August 30, 2023 @ 1:00pm Eastern (UTC-4) / 12:00pm
Central / 10:00am Pacific for our free CODE Presents: Prompt Engineering - How
to Talk to an AI webinar presented by Markus Egger
[http://url7522.codemag.com/ls/click?upn=xfZQWdEXOwj5-2BpT2uVrc-2B1p500nk-2FFqgfZff0cWUmjcq-2B0r7OWYBwCfPMuMhTlSmbocFPA7WTuJNmyJ03a4FMw-3D-3D7sbi_uvbLiPzki20FzZcfCsl0JhqtR9M9KijZ6tHnN1jzsxfh31xhhtptB0ITWBqQf1xCjPTVwZdkg2fcPqRuxz5WPoICxuNXMzDJZ-2BhQH6pp1ftSj-2B-2BGtUSu8yObyyrRKNSHSx5rU2lmmJynM9eZaT4nnfZE6Koo-2BKM-2FCQLdGP7AEJsEIAJndC1hlOiGCTD2F1Sx5GZeaolPlNmXTcHGEe8TBbZYQ725ONnIhJke4yXoLspjHboFrLsbQ4uAf-2BQOlsuLaelpAhp1Qx4zwejob8jEWg-3D-3D]
(CODE Magazine Publisher, Author, International Speaker and Microsoft Regional
Director (RD).

Unleashing the potential of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and effectively
harnessing its capabilities can be a challenge. How do we prevent AI from
generating hallucinatory output? What are the pressing security and privacy
considerations? How can we secure reliable information that's grounded in
reality, offering predictability, traceability, and repeatability? Moreover,
what are the mechanisms for integrating your personal documents and data into
this foundational information?

Join us in this webinar as Markus Egger, an industry luminary, Microsoft
Regional Director, and the founder of CODE, addresses these questions and much
more. Uncover the mysteries of effective AI interaction and learn how to
navigate through the potential challenges to truly maximize your AI utilization.


Click Here to Register for FREE!
[http://url7522.codemag.com/ls/click?upn=xfZQWdEXOwj5-2BpT2uVrc-2B1p500nk-2FFqgfZff0cWUmjdZx8ArntSYpt1rE0SDSzQjfPkNxwRf28PcdKeWcEENyv-2FRgayLmzEP699CurnxPwdXe5YgSrx-2FJmad3-2FVUcqE8VDUxF00nVwmLyCAlwRqO-2Bm0UUlpv1bQD0zRLc11A3Cc-3D5U_V_uvbLiPzki20FzZcfCsl0JhqtR9M9KijZ6tHnN1jzsxfh31xhhtptB0ITWBqQf1xCjPTVwZdkg2fcPqRuxz5WPqQCfBXDZDszqvRuOEDP2GMOXKccZi39ATNJs9BBT7wFG-2ByQTzAb0-2FCNjiQ9qVBLaLXikd3Jt-2FB4Awk0eiFw849YzjtvKuWdI2yaIyux8kJMPoZ1QCEi-2BcVSLdzRXgWNt8mtLX4ho3dVw2I5ZcMJv3nhAomt2POoOuBIQms6fHj0jQoiXBo4ecD9m1m5tGVPjA-3D-3D]

HARNESS THE POWER OF AI AND COPILOTS WITH CODE CONSULTING!

Discover the Power of AI: Schedule Your AI Executive Briefing Today!

Want to know how Artificial Intelligence can revolutionize your business? Don't
let the hype confuse you—make informed decisions and propel your organization
forward with an AI Executive Briefing.

During our AI Executive Briefing, your company will receive:

 1. An overview of the current state of AI
 2. Details on Integrating AI into your business with emphasis on privacy and
    security.
 3. A sample application tailored to your organization.
 4. A roadmap for harnessing AI within your organization.

Click Here to Learn More
[http://url7522.codemag.com/ls/click?upn=xfZQWdEXOwj5-2BpT2uVrc-2B1p500nk-2FFqgfZff0cWUmjcQdfa7A-2B-2BY854PoISZ-2FMSVP34cY8JcBZeBhJ7u-2FubOhBZd6CSxRq-2B7y78Q2AGEIWtyxRsa5TFNSS7XcdD2JaVnZpxlN8HxTHI29znLCOL3YHApexkpjeSx95rEBrjyhyI-3Dlyr2_uvbLiPzki20FzZcfCsl0JhqtR9M9KijZ6tHnN1jzsxfh31xhhtptB0ITWBqQf1xCjPTVwZdkg2fcPqRuxz5WPm2Fkqq-2FN8aqvmyXJznonLqyIIy439ZclXmtDEZY-2F1WJdfZbJY7g7pbaf43dfYGYdhnXPD2CTSqHHU-2B9Y-2BZYw37RNxN29vFDDs6AJuMMwB65-2F7iHIp6ao-2Bt5-2FLfljPkLkUGptcReIa8kWy43HyRFc3ZlQ994my-2BkyDWSb6CYRjd2ltjLatgzz-2FKCkO1k1MuFIg-3D-3D]
